projects.name: Politician Stock Tracker
projects.description: Senior Design project done in collaberation with Gavin Roy that exapnds upon StockBot. Provides data analysis on trades made by 200+ members of congress. Uses Selenium to scrape thousands of stock trades from multiple different websites. A custom GUI made in tkinter is used to display the information.

projects.name: StockBot
projects.description: Uses bs4 and selenium to web-scrape stock trades made by members of congress. These stocks are then placed into a SQL server for analysis

projects.name: Blockchain
projects.description: A blockchain system consisting of blockchain, wallet, and miner classes. The chain is capable of adding blocks, verifying transcations, searching the chain and generating signatures.

projects.name: 3D Renderer
projects.description: Renders a 3d scene and turns it into a ppm image. Images can be generated using ray tracing, meshs, and different textures. Multiple images can be turned into an animation.

projects.name: Pokedex Website
projects.description: A pokedex expressed as a website.

projects.name: VacWorld
projects.description: Several AI Agents that traverse a room to perform the job of an automated vacum (roomba).

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Uses a React app to display my portfolio. Has a searchable table with expandable rows.

projects.name: ViLT FastAPI App
projects.description: A REST API connected to a ViLT model that lives in a docker container. When the user gives the api a question and an image the api will return an answer to that question.

projects.name: 2D Renderer
projects.description: Renders a 2d scene and turns it into a ppm image.

projects.name: CS320
projects.description: A collection of the projects I completed in CS320. Major topics include sorting algorithms and graphs

projects.name: Paystation
projects.description: The paystation is a mock parking meter. It allows the user to enter a given 'coin' and recive a certain amount of time based on the amount and city. The station then prints the user a recipt. The city can be selected before the transaction is made. The paystation also features a GUI.

projects.name: Jelle Programming Language
projects.description: Jelle is an interpereted language I created as part of CS230 (Programming Languages). Jelle is capable of basic artithmatic, for and while loops, assignemnts, inputs, and if statements.

projects.name: Orange Store
projects.description: A simple store serving as an intorduction to web development. The store features multiple products, Javascript functions, and a php order form.

projects.name: Cookie-Counter
projects.description: A simple counter that uses cookies to save the running count. Uses CSS animations for detail.

projects.name: tic-tac-toe
projects.description: A basic use of React that functions as a Tic-Tac-Toe game. Keeps a history of moves made and can move backwards along the history.

projects.name: produce
projects.description: Uses React to create a table of Produce avaliable. Produce can be filtered using a search bar
